Html:
Hi Mark,

I have read the license for using nAudio, but I am just interested in using some of the source code from nAudio (specifically the code for playing WAV files) and I am wondering how the licensing would work for that.

Any insights are greatly appreciated.

Marc

It's the MS-PL license, so I think that is fine. If you are releasing your code as open source, it should acknowledge the original source of the code.

Mark
